ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds raw peanuts, in shells

cookingTips: Boil peanuts for 12-16 hours until tender; older peanuts take longer
Use raw peanuts in the shell, not roasted, for proper boiling
Salt water generously; peanuts absorb brine flavor as they cook
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Boiled peanuts are a regional specialty. How would you explain the texture and flavor to someone unfamiliar with them, and what makes this preparation special?
